title: Complimenting font for Latinaires
content:
Hi all,

Can anyone help my choose a complimenting font for Latinaires ( [http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/latinaires/](http://web.archive.org/web/20131023203652/http:/www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/latinaires/ "http://www.myfonts.com/fonts/sudtipos/latinaires/"))

Latinaires is used in the logo, I think using it also for heading would be quite nice, but I am now looking for a type for the body text.

Appreciate any help.

Thanks
author: reboot

comments.content: still not find one for this, can anyone help?
